def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    pos = sum(1 for x in arr if x > 0)
    neg = sum(x for x in arr if x < 0)
    return [pos, neg] if len(arr) else []

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return [len([x for x in arr if x > 0])] + [sum(y for y in arr if y < 0)] if arr else []

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return [sum(n > 0 for n in arr), sum(n for n in arr if n < 0)] if arr else []
count_positives_sum_negatives = lambda arr: [len([e for e in arr if e>0]), sum(e for e in arr if e<0)] if arr else []

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    if arr is None or len(arr) == 0:
        return []

    non_positives = [x for x in arr if x < 1]
    count_positives = len(arr) - len(non_positives)
    sum_negatives = sum(non_positives)
    
    return [count_positives, sum_negatives]

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return [len([i for i in arr if i > 0]),sum([i for i in arr if i < 0])] if arr else []

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return [len([x for x in arr if x > 0]), sum(filter(lambda x: x < 0, arr))] if len(arr) != 0 else []

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return arr and [sum(1 for a in arr if a > 0), sum(a for a in arr if a < 0)] or []

def count_positives_sum_negatives(x):
    return [] if len(x) == 0 else [sum([[x.count(i), 1][1] for i in x if i > 0]), sum([i for i in x if i < 0])]

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return [] if arr == [] else [sum(1 for x in arr if x > 0), sum(x for x in arr if x < 0)]

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return [len([x for x in arr if x > 0]), sum(x for x  in arr if x < 0)] if arr else []

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return [] if not arr else [len([i for i in arr if i > 0]), sum(j for j in arr if j < 0)]

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):    
    return [] if arr == None or arr == [] else [len(list(filter(lambda x: x > 0, arr))), sum(filter(lambda x: x < 0, arr))]

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    if arr == []:
        return []
    c = 0
    a = []
    i = [ i for i in arr if i > 0]
    n = [ i for i in arr if i < 0]
    a.append(len(i))
    a.append(sum(n))
    
    return a

def count_positives_sum_negatives(a):
    return a and [sum(i > 0 for i in a), sum(i for i in a if i < 0)]

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return [len([i for i in arr if i > 0]), sum([i for i in arr if i < 0])] if arr != [] else []

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return [[sum(i>0 for i in arr), sum(i for i in arr if i < 0)],[]][arr==[]]

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return [[x>0 for x in arr].count(True), sum([x for x in arr if x < 0])] if arr else []

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return [sum(1 for x in arr if x > 0),sum(x for x in arr if x < 0)] if arr else []

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return [len(list(filter(lambda x:x>0,arr))),sum(filter(lambda x:x<0,arr))] if arr else []

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    neg = 0
    neg = sum(el for el in arr if el < 0)
    pos = 0
    pos = len([el for el in arr if el > 0])
    return [pos, neg] if arr else []

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return arr and [sum(1 for n in arr if n > 0), sum(n for n in arr if n < 0)] or []

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    return ([],[len([x for x in arr if x>0]), sum(x for x in arr if x<0)])[len(arr)!=0]

def count_positives_sum_negatives(arr):
    res = []
    pos = len([x for x in arr if x > 0])
    neg = sum([x for x in arr if x < 0])
    res.append(pos), res.append(neg)
    return res if len(arr) > 0 else arr
